Throughout his career, Brolin has worked alongside industry heavyweights, including Robert Redford, Martin Scorsese, Quentin Tarantino, and David Fincher. He is perhaps best known for his portrayal of villainous characters, such as John Milton in "Snowden" (2016) and Joker in the "Dark Knight" trilogy (2008-2012), both of which solidified his place in cinematic history.
